data.text: @emmathatteacher @BaltCoPS It just seemed very abrupt. I was actually ready to tell my 7 year old she could decide if she wants to wear it or not, but then I saw this jump at her school and think maybe she should keep it on for a bit. It's really hard to know what's right!
@RabbitNbr8 @BaltCoPS Yea… it’s not the smartest thing to do, but it is nice not wearing a mask. I have a sore throat and I’m wondering if I got it from a kid, I’ve started wearing my mask again
@BaltCoPS My kid's school had 6 cases in 3 days following the removal of mask mandates - 5 in the same grade in the same week, which would be the first in-school transmission since they've been back.
@BaltCoPS bruh why ain’t y’all close, so tired of y’all
@BaltCoPS Freezing rain tmr close school please you shit heads
